text:
Hi, I'm having a lot of trouble animating with makie. No matter what I do, when I run `record` I get
```ERROR: DimensionMismatch("tried to assign n×m array to m×n destination")```

elements.text: Hi, I'm having a lot of trouble animating with makie. No matter what I do, when I run
ERROR: DimensionMismatch("tried to assign n×m array to m×n destination")

text: All I can deduct from this information is, that you're trying to assign an nxm array do an mxn

elements.text: All I can deduct from this information is, that you're trying to assign an nxm array do an mxn
